data.description: Gather stats from the SETI@home web server
data.communities:
E-mail conversation with Martin Hamilton (current author of
    SETI::Stats)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SETI::Stats currently has no functionality to retrieve statistics
    from the SETI@home web server. SETI::Stats was designed to retrieve
    stats from machines that have the SETI@home client installed i.e
    local files.

    SETI::WebStats will retrieve the XML output generated by the
    SETI@Home web server and will not be dependent on a SETI@home client
    installation.

    Per a conversation with the current author of SETI::Stats, we
    decided that the web server stats gathering functionality belonged
    in it's own module. SETI::WebStats will be that module.
